text: [Zhen] xinshi zhishi naxie quexin an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de ren. Dang tamen tong ta [mu sheng] yiqi shangtao gongwu shi, tamen zai xiang ta qingqiu xuke qian, jue bu hui shanzi li qu. Fan xiang ni qingqiu xuke zhe, zhexie ren que shi duxin an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de ren. Dang tamen yin sishi xiang ni qingqiu xuke shi, ni keyi zhunxu tamen zhong ni suo manyi zhe. Ni dang qiu an la kuanshu tamen. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
